attributes.action: Implement a minimum length for Cumberland sausage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cumberland sausage is a delicious product but is frequently sold outside Cumbria in short links, like any other common or garden sausage. This is plain wrong. Until the campaign to give Cumberland Sausage European Union recognition under the Protected Food Name Scheme, we call on the Prime Minister to implement an immediate ban on the selling of any product under the name of Cumberland Sausage unless is it is at least 1 metre in length.
